title: D-204 Controlled Access, Spacious Closets, Patio or Balcony
posting_body: ['The Villas at Rowland Heights Apartments in Rowland Heights, CA', "The Villa's at Rowland Heights 55+ Senior Community offers its residents an enriched lifestyle, a selection of luxurious rental homes, impeccable service, appealing amenities and an outstanding location.", 'Oscar Wilde said, "I\'m a person of simple tastes.', 'I\'m satisfied with only the best."', "Consider The Villa's at Rowland Heights your finest choice.", 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants- BRE #1525033', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 117', 'OR Text', '117', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 600 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Refrigerator', '- Window Covering', '- Dishwasher', '- Patio or Balcony', '- Gas Stove', '- Cable or Satellite Ready', '- Carpet or Vinyl Flooring.', '- Crown Molding in selected Units', '- Spacious Closets', '- Pet Friendly', '- Custom paint throughout', '- Central A/C & Heat', 'Community Amenities', '- Disability Access', '- Public Transportation', '- Pets Allowed', '- Library and 4 Centrally Located Laundry Facilities on Site', '- Off Street Parking', '- Sparkling & heated pool and spa', '- Club House', '- Close to Dining, Shopping, and Public Transportation', '- Laundry Facility', '- Freeway Access', '- Controlled Access', '- Fitness Center', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly Community', '*Breed and Weight Restrictions Apply', 'Office Hours', 'Monday to Sunday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Villas at Rowland Heights', '18600 Colima Road, Rowland Heights, CA, 91748', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'Zc7ByhED8g']
